name: Riddle of the Roots
description:
Make your way through the dark dungeon! Rootlings have taken over, making your escape dangerous.

Collect different weapons to cut through the roots and enemies blocking your path. Solve puzzles to lift the heavy bars from your path. Remember the color combination. Fight, think and survive.

Controlls:

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

 Left Mouse Button to hit

E to interact
